Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Raspberry, Rose de Mai, Violet and Jasmine; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Benzoin, Suede, Vanilla, Myrrh, Musk, Cashmere Wood, Opoponax, Birch, Saffron, Patchouli, Labdanum, Ambergris, Pepper, Sandalwood and Orris Root.

Name: Enigma Pour Femme Essence De Parfum
Description: Enigma Pour Femme Essence De Parfum by Roja Dove is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. Enigma Pour Femme Essence De Parfum was launched in 2021. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are May Rose, Peach, Heliotrope, Ylang-Ylang, Geranium, Neroli and Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood, Orris, Ambergris and Patchouli.Soft powdery whispers of Orris and Musk dances around a central note of elegant Rose de Mai. But all is not what it seems as an explosion of juicy Peach – nature’s forbidden fruit - hints at something more mysterious to sink your teeth into. Beneath this portrait of refined femininity, something deeper and more exotic weaves its way out of the shadows. A damp, earthy accent of Patchouli brings a carnal edge to the sensuality of Sandalwood, which is taken to dizzying heights with the animalic impulse of Orientalgris. At once familiar and yet utterly ambiguous, the inability to put your finger on who that woman is, is the enigma itself.An elegantly seductive perfume, Enigma has the magical ability to envelope the wearer in its exotic charm and enchant any who fall into its path. Based around the seductive qualities of Peach and Sandalwood, a swathe of this voluptuous fruit contributes a velvety-smooth sweetness to the depth of this legendary skin-mimicking wood. A touch of citrus Bergamot alongside vibrant Heliotrope and Geranium lend a light freshness which is made rich and indulgent by a heart of Rose and Ylang Ylang, whilst intensely sensual notes of Orientalgris and Musk linger in the shadows and form a perfume that gives the wearer a notable je ne sais quoi.

Name: Apex Eau Intense
Accords: woody (100%); warm spicy (89.7672%); amber (87.8553%); aromatic (84.2289%); musky (78.6907%); fresh spicy (70.6505%); balsamic (61.6263%); citrus (59.2372%); green (55.5261%); patchouli (55.3011%)
Description: Apex Eau Intense by Roja Dove is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Apex Eau Intense was launched in 2025. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Cotton. Top notes are Helvetolide, Chlorophyll, Mint, Lemon, Bergamot, Mandarin, Clary Sage and Lavender; middle notes are Rose Oxide and Pomelo; base notes are Ambroxan, Velvione™, Patchouli, Pepper, Cardamon, Cedar, elemi, Musk, Myrrh, Sandalwood, Grass, Cashmere Wood, Driftwood and Violet Leaf.Apex Eau Intense by Roja Dove is an olfactory journey into a lush rainforest, featuring a Chypré accord that unfolds with a rich array of natural perfumery notes. This fragrance aims to inspire a deeper connection to the natural world.

Name: Amber Aoud Absolue Precieux
Accords: citrus (100%); rose (78.2054%); patchouli (74.6348%); woody (71.8035%); warm spicy (65.8991%); earthy (52.7511%); floral (48.9123%); balsamic (47.3185%); fresh spicy (46.974%); aromatic (44.9971%)
Description: Amber Aoud Absolue Precieux by Roja Dove is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Amber Aoud Absolue Precieux was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Lime, Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose de Mai, Fig, Jasmine and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Patchouli, Agarwood (Oud), Saffron, Ambergris, Benzoin, Cinnamon, Musk, Oakmoss, Sandalwood, Orris Root and Birch.

Name: Manhattan
Accords: warm spicy (100%); woody (74.6205%); vanilla (73.4752%); sweet (67.7031%); powdery (63.2592%); aromatic (63.1675%); tobacco (62.9846%); coconut (55.6547%); fresh spicy (51.4399%); patchouli (49.241%)
Description: Manhattan by Roja Dove is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. Manhattan was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bergamot, Lavender and Basil; middle notes are Coconut, Heliotrope, Violet, Jasmine and May Rose; base notes are Tobacco, Clove, Vanilla, Patchouli, Cinnamon, Benzoin, Ginger, Musk, Pink Pepper, Pine, Cedar, Vetiver and Oakmoss.

Name: Scandal
Accords: white floral (100%); tuberose (54.8461%); floral (49.7691%); animalic (45.3027%); powdery (45.0658%); citrus (44.3316%)
Description: Scandal by Roja Dove is a Floral fragrance for women. Scandal was launched in 2007. Top notes are Bergamot and Lavender; middle notes are Tuberose, Gardenia, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Freesia, Rose and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Orris Root, Musk and Sandalwood.
Pros and cons: ['Dreamy modern romantic white floral melange', 'Versatile for everyday wear', 'Youthful and bright scent', 'Not heady or powdery', 'Classic vibe without being old-fashioned', 'Smooth and well-blended', 'Exotic and feminine', 'Moderate sillage and longevity', 'Expensive for a simple and light scent', 'Not a screaming white floral presence', 'Minimal sweetness in the scent', 'Lacks complexity', 'Foody smell after a while on the skin', 'Too much jasmine and gardenia for some', "Pastiche tuberose that doesn't gel well", 'Strong chemical or animalic smell']
Longevity: very weak: 6%; weak: 11%; moderate: 29%; long lasting: 37%; eternal: 17%

Name: Danger Pour Femme Essence De Parfum
Accords: powdery (100%); woody (91.4377%); vanilla (85.5106%); sweet (68.1988%); warm spicy (56.9087%); yellow floral (56.3441%); iris (56.3441%); citrus (53.239%); musky (48.8173%); white floral (48.8173%)
Description: Danger Pour Femme Essence De Parfum by Roja Dove is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. Danger Pour Femme Essence De Parfum was launched in 2021. Top notes are Bergamot, Grapefruit, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Peach, May Rose, Jasmine, Violet and Gardenia; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Orris, Musk, Clove and Patchouli.Dangerous not just for those wearing it, but for those who smell it on them: demure Rose de Mai creates a fresh and willing invitation but beware as aphrodisiacs lurk in the shadows, daring you to breathe in a little deeper. Creamy white flowers coax the sweetness of Sandalwood and Vanilla into a siren’s song, where skin-like Orris and Musk tempt you to lean in a little closer. Just remember, you have been warned…Rather than warning those who smell it to stay away, Danger is the type of scent that invites them to come closer. Displaying a hidden moreishness, the juice of four zesty Citrus fruits melt into the velvety sweetness of Peach and Tonka Bean, giving any who smell it a subliminal invite of something worth sinking their teeth into. Prominent aphrodisiac notes of indulgent Vanilla and warm, creamy Jasmine blend into Ylang Ylang and a knowing blush of Rose to create an intensely seductive floral heart. The sensuality and depth of Sandalwood forms the bed upon which this entire fragrance lays, whilst the animalic impulse of Musk beckons a flirtatious “come hither”.

Name: Lakmé
Description: Lakmé by Roja Dove is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Lakmé was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes and Citruses; middle notes are May Rose, Taif Rose, Magnolia, Lily-of-the-Valley and Peach; base notes are Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Pink Pepper, Vanilla, Benzoin, Sandalwood, Orris, Cashmere Wood, Olibanum, Musk, Labdanum, Ambergris and Agarwood (Oud).

Name: NüWa 2015 Edition
Accords: rose (100%); warm spicy (91.4331%); woody (86.627%); vanilla (86.1046%); amber (84.7466%); citrus (83.6495%); fresh spicy (82.3439%); white floral (79.1049%); powdery (68.8656%); balsamic (68.2909%)
Description: NüWa 2015 Edition by Roja Dove is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. NüWa 2015 Edition was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bergamot and Grapefruit; middle notes are Rose de Mai, Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Benzoin, Vanilla, Pepper, Cumin, Peru Balsam and Cloves."Benzoin, Peru Balsam, and Vanilla blend to create a soft base, enlivened by Cumin, Clove, and Pepper, warmed by Sandalwood, which wraps around a heart of Rose, Jasmine, and Orange Blossom, the whole freshened with Bergamot and Grapefruit. Inspired by the legend of NüWa, the gentle and kindly Chinese goddess who is said to have created humanity; and according to the myth taught her people to be creative and wise, introduced beauty through music, song and dance, and filled all flowers with fragrance. A tender liquid narrative to seduce the soul, a gentle harmony of Rose, Jasmin and Orange Blossom create a floral song that graces a pillowy bed of Sandalwood, Benzoin and Vanilla." - Roja Dove.

Name: Fruity Aoud
Description: Fruity Aoud by Roja Dove is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Fruity Aoud was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Grapefruit, Artemisia and Bergamot; middle notes are Strawberry, Raspberry, Black Currant, Rose, Orange Blossom and Violet; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Vanilla, Gurjan balsam, Leather, Labdanum, Olibanum, Musk, Saffron, Amyris, Cardamom, Cashmere Wood, Guaiac Wood, Sandalwood, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Oakmoss, Orris, Patchouli, Cedar and Birch.
Base Notes: ['Agarwood (Oud)', 'Vanilla', 'Gurjan balsam', 'Leather', 'Labdanum', 'Olibanum', 'Musk', 'Saffron', 'Amyris', 'Cardamom', 'Cashmere Wood', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Sandalwood', 'Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha', 'Oakmoss', 'Orris', 'Patchouli', 'Cedar', 'Birch']

Name: Scandal Pour Femme Essence De Parfum
Accords: white floral (100%); floral (48.3065%); tuberose (48.2795%); citrus (45.0753%); animalic (44.2741%)
Description: Scandal Pour Femme Essence De Parfum by Roja Dove is a Floral fragrance for women. Scandal Pour Femme Essence De Parfum was launched in 2021. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Gardenia, Tuberose, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Freesia, Lily-of-the-Valley and May Rose; base notes are Musk, Orris and Sandalwood.When a scandal hits, heads turn and secrets unravel. Everything is exposed as barriers are pushed and limits are tested. You either hide, or embrace it. Never one to shy away from the spotlight, Scandal opens with a head-turning trilogy of creamy white florals. Deeply narcotic Tuberose, Gardenia and Jasmine form the heart of this creation, whilst warm whispers of Sandalwood, Orris and Musk create a soft and sensual bed for these inviting white petals to fall upon. But be warned, for when wearing this daring bouquet, it is impossible not to tempt others to talk.A bright, fresh note of citrus Bergamot opens Scandal with a burst of sunshine, the warmth of which shines down onto a beautiful flower garden. The sweet freshness of Lily, Rose, Orange Blossom and Freesia sublimate a central accord of Tuberose, Gardenia and Jasmine, whose creamy white petals push a velvety sensuality to centre-stage. Like skin warmed by the sun, Sandalwood holds this floral accord close to the wearer, whilst whispers of powdery Orris lend a light and effervescent quality that makes Scandal a fragrance which is bright and sensual all in perfect conjunction.

Name: Fortnum & Mason The Perfume
Description: Fortnum & Mason The Perfume by Roja Dove is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. Fortnum & Mason The Perfume was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Peach, May Rose, Labdanum, Jasmine, Geranium and Orange Blossom; base notes are Amber, Vanilla, Saffron, Labdanum, Birch, Amyris, Castoreum, Oakmoss, Olibanum, Benzoin, Musk, Patchouli, Coriander, Vetiver and Sandalwood.“Fortnum & Mason - it is impossible not to be enveloped by the richness of this iconic symbol of British luxury. I love its understated elegance - the subtle gestures that are distinctly British - distinctly Fortnum's. I have reflected this in the composition, a luxurious Oriental base, rarely used in perfumery, forms the foundation of this creation, whilst an exquisite blend of Leather, Aoud, and precious Woods intermingle with the note of Rose – the flower of England. The sunburst – an emblem of the store – adorns the label and box, evocative of the timelessness and warmth that pervades every floor.” - a note from the brand.

Name: Risque
Description: Risque by Roja Dove is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Risque was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bergamot, Lemon and Litsea Cubeba; middle notes are Chamomile, Hyacinth, Rose, Jasmine and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Oakmoss, Civet, Patchouli, Vetiver, Labdanum and Cedar.The opening is, indeed, surprising - a confident Chypre that has a dry warmth with a refreshing after burst that quickly melds with the heart notes and becomes quite intoxicating. All that Rose and Jasmine build and build, intermingling with the mosses and the narcotically sumptuous Hyacinth and finally releasing you into the deeply sublime drydown of the base notes, with the Civet practically cackling with glee as it reels you in. In lesser hands, this perfume could have seemed old-fashioned or brashly obvious, but Roja Parfums have created in Risqué a glittering bombshell who beckons you with silken gloves, leaves lipstick on your cocktail glass and a trail of exotic plumage in its glamorous wake.

Name: Fetish
Description: Fetish by Roja Dove is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Fetish was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Petitgrain and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Rose, Ylang-Ylang and Tuberose; base notes are Oakmoss, Galbanum, Castoreum, Cloves, Cedar, Patchouli, Vetiver, Musk and Cinnamon.

Name: Caramelized Sugar S’Mores
Description: Caramelized Sugar S’Mores by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caramelized Sugar S’Mores was launched in 2022.Dua Fragrances has added a new gourmand scent to their collection, simply titled 'Original: A Dua Original Blend'. This fragrance is unisex and comes in an Extrait de Parfum concentration. Dua has taken a classic marshmallow accord and turned it into a gourmand delight by combining it with chocolate and other secret ingredients. The sweetness of caramelized brown sugar and maple syrup are also present, along with the smoky aroma of marshmallows and graham crackers. Gourmand fragrances have been growing in popularity, and Dua's 'Original' is sure to satisfy those looking for a sweet, nostalgic scent.The notes in 'Original: A Dua Original Blend' include caramelized brown sugar, maple syrup, chocolate, condensed milk, smoked marshmallows, graham crackers, and sweet vanilla. The combination of these notes creates a fragrance that smells like s'mores - the beloved campfire treat. The sweetness of the caramelized sugar and maple syrup blends perfectly with the smokiness of the marshmallows and graham crackers. The chocolate note adds depth and richness to the fragrance while the sweet vanilla ties it all together. Overall, this is a deliciously sweet and comforting scent that will transport you back to childhood camping trips.

Name: Berry Orange Bubblegum
Description: Berry Orange Bubblegum by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Berry Orange Bubblegum was launched in 2024.Berry Orange Bubblegum by DUA DESIGNER LINE is a fruity gourmand fragrance inspired by BBG by Optico Profumo. This well-rounded fragrance features a nostalgic initial note of bubblegum, with orange adding energy and strawberry providing a playful touch. The scent offers strong projection and silage power.

Name: Cookies & Milk
Description: Cookies & Milk by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cookies & Milk was launched in 2024.Cookies & Milk by DUA is a gourmand fragrance inspired by Latte e Biscotti by Cerchi Nell'Acqua. It captures the essence of a comforting breakfast with notes of hot milk, vanilla sugar, and biscuit, offering a rich and creamy experience.

Name: Desire II
Description: Desire II by The Dua Brand is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. Desire II was launched in 2018.Desire II by The Dua Brand is a captivating fragrance that offers an intimate look at the bountiful treasures of the Amazon. This unisex fragrance is part of a series that explores the allure of the land, and Desire II specifically takes us on a sensory journey with its exotic fruit notes. With a concentration of Extrait de Parfum, this fragrance delivers a long-lasting and intense experience.The scent of Desire II is characterized by a marriage of succulent aromas and rich imagery. The ripe mango flesh and juicy pineapple evoke the gustatory delights of the tropics, while an exotic floral bouquet accord immerses the wearer in the vibrant vegetation of the Amazon. As the fragrance develops, notes of cedarwood provide a touch of sophistication, and musk adds a layer of elegance. Overall, Desire II by The Dua Brand is an olfactory masterpiece that celebrates the beauty and abundance of the Amazon.

Name: Sweet Milk
Description: Sweet Milk by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men."Sweet Milk is inspired by Milk by Commodity. This fragrance is like a warm hug in a bottle. It's perfect for anyone who loves sweet, milky treats. The fragrance begins with notes of fresh Milk, creamy and delicious just like sipping a glass of it on a lazy morning."

Name: French Macaroons Gourmand Escape
Description: French Macaroons Gourmand Escape by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. French Macaroons Gourmand Escape was launched in 2024.French Macaroons Gourmand Escape is a sweet and indulgent fragrance that combines the goodness of French Macaroons by The Dua Brand and Escapade Gourmande by Maison Mataha. The fragrance begins with a creamy fusion of custard and milk, intertwined with juicy cherry, evoking the taste of sweet candy. The scent continues with the thrill of sticky cotton candy and the softness of spun sugar. The final layer includes marzipan, black sugar, and the warmth of vanilla, with rich undertones of tonka bean and musk enhancing the projection.

Name: Dua Therapy
Description: Dua Therapy by The Dua Brand is a Floral fragrance for women and men. Dua Therapy was launched in 2021.Dua Therapy by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that pays homage to the popular niche brand, Initio Parfums. Initio is known for its fast-growing success and unique offerings, and Dua Therapy is no exception. This unisex fragrance is an exquisite blend of musks, black currant, and sandalwood, creating an intoxicating scent experience. The creamy sweetness in the base is absolutely delightful, while the refreshing bergamot in the opening keeps the fragrance lively for an extended period of time. Dua Therapy is available in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and captivating scent experience.The notes featured in Dua Therapy include musk, white musk, black currant, bergamot, mandarin orange, white sandalwood, magnolia, and hedione. The fragrance encapsulates a sense of elegance and uniqueness through its enigmatic blend of musks and the intricate sensation created by touches of hedione and synthetic musk. The overall result is a fragrance that is both alluring and captivating. With its woody floral musk olfactory group, Dua Therapy offers a sophisticated and versatile scent that can be enjoyed by individuals of all genders.

Name: The Note Of Milk
Accords: lactonic (100%); caramel (86%); coconut (86%); sweet (80.4002%); tropical (46.8001%); vanilla (46.8001%)
Description: The Note Of Milk by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Note Of Milk was launched in 2024.The Note Of Milk by DUA is inspired by Lait Concentré by Chabaud Maison de Parfum. This fragrance opens with a creamy, lactonic scent reminiscent of freshly opened coconut milk, thanks to notes of milk and coconut. It then transitions into a warm milk scent with a hint of sweetness, enriched by caramel, creating a comforting and addictive aroma.

Name: Vanilla Ice Cream
Description: Vanilla Ice Cream by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Ice Cream was launched in 2024.Vanilla Ice Cream by The Dua Brand is inspired by Vanilla Vice by Snif. This fragrance opens with creamy notes of ice cream, blended with the exotic richness of Madagascar vanilla. The heart blooms with the delicate scent of jasmine sambac, adding a touch of floral elegance. As it settles, warm and woody undertones of amberwood, musk, and orcanox emerge, creating a complex and enduring base.

Name: Apricot Honey Cupcake
Description: Apricot Honey Cupcake by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Apricot Honey Cupcake was launched in 2024.Apricot Honey Cupcake is an exquisite fragrance that combines the sweet essence of sun-ripened apricots with the golden richness of pure honey. The scent evokes the comforting aroma of freshly baked cupcakes, with notes of juicy apricot nectar syrup and fresh cut apricots. The heart reveals a luxurious blend of honeycomb and manuka honey drizzle syrup, complemented by bourbon vanilla and rich praline. Subtle hints of whipped cream, sugar syrup, and vanilla frosting complete this gourmand composition.

Name: Caribbean Waters
Accords: citrus (100%); sweet (81.0151%); coconut (65%); vanilla (52.3787%); rum (48.2424%); fresh spicy (46.6781%)
Description: Caribbean Waters by The Dua Brand is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. The nose behind this fragrance is Mahsam Raza.

Name: Blueberry Cookies
Description: Blueberry Cookies by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blueberry Cookies was launched in 2024.Blueberry Cookies by Dua Fragrances is an original blend that captures the nostalgic aroma of baking cookies. This gourmand fragrance features a sweet and icy frozen blueberries accord, complemented by notes of salted butter, white sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, and almond milk. It offers a delightful combination of fruity, sweet, and velvety aromas, making it a unique addition to any gourmand perfume collection.

Name: Almond Milk
Description: Almond Milk by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Almond Milk was launched in 2024.Almond Milk by Dua Fragrances is an olfactory tribute to the beloved ingredient, almond. This fragrance combines a creamy milk accord and vanilla with the finest almond raw material to create an authentic and irresistible scent. Almond Milk is an uncomplicated and unforgettable fragrance.

Name: Matchalicious
Accords: green (100%); white floral (92.4204%); sweet (88.8536%); fresh (75.4779%); aromatic (71.0193%); fresh spicy (69.2357%); citrus (61.2104%); chocolate (54.9682%); ozonic (49.6179%); woody (46.0511%)
Description: Matchalicious by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Matchalicious was launched in 2021.Matchalicious by The Dua Brand is an aromatic green fragrance that comes in a concentration of extrait de parfum. This unisex scent is available in a 30 ml (1 fl. oz) bottle. The Dua Brand has created Matchalicious as an inspired expression of Matcha Meditation by Replica. The fragrance aims to capture the aroma and experience of matcha, a special variety of tea known for its unique smell and taste. Combining the green tea note with bergamot and mandarin orange, Matchalicious creates an exquisite smell that is both bright and peppy. Notes of mate and jasmine contribute to the serenity, while white chocolate in the base adds a delicious touch. This fragrance is versatile, smooth, classy, and addictive, providing a long-lasting experience of meditation and relaxation. Matchalicious belongs to the olfactory group of Aromatic Green fragrances.

Name: Chilled Horchata
Accords: cinnamon (100%); fresh spicy (100%); warm spicy (85.9997%); almond (64.9998%); lactonic (64.9998%); vanilla (64.9998%); sweet (52.7501%); floral (51%); nutty (51%); fruity (47.5001%)
Description: Chilled Horchata by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Chilled Horchata was launched in 2024.Chilled Horchata captures the essence and refreshing aura of the beloved Mexican drink in a fragrance. The scent opens with creamy and milky Rice Milk, followed by a spicy accord of Cinnamon. As the fragrance develops, Vanilla emerges, creating a delightful aura. The scent settles into a cozy embrace of Almond and Nutmeg, grounding the fragrance and ensuring its lasting appeal.

Name: Italiano
Description: Italiano by The Dua Brand is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. Italiano was launched in 2018.

Name: River Fougère
Accords: aromatic (100%); fresh spicy (85.0158%); woody (80.3195%); warm spicy (71.3736%); anis (61.3101%); lavender (61.3101%); soft spicy (58.1789%); earthy (50.7986%); mossy (50.1275%); floral (46.9968%)
Description: River Fougère by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. River Fougère was launched in 2020.River Fougère by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that pays homage to the iconic fashion house Yves Saint Laurent and their groundbreaking men's version of the popular women's fragrance Rive Gauche. Released in 2003, this fragrance captures the essence of French culture and heritage, resonating with its inspiration from the left side of the river Seine in Paris. As an Extrait de Parfum, River Fougère offers a concentrated and long-lasting scent experience. It is a fragrance that seeks to recreate the splendor and vigor of the vintage formulation from 2003, appealing to fragrance enthusiasts who appreciate the authenticity of original compositions. With bright and natural lavender as its defining note, complemented by aromatic touches of rosemary, this scent exudes a sense of sophistication and masculinity. The earthy base notes of vetiver and oakmoss provide a stronger and more organic presence compared to current formulations. By owning River Fougère, you can own a piece of history and indulge in a scent that captures the essence of a true gentleman. River Fougère belongs to the olfactory group of Aromatic Fougere fragrances.

Name: I'm A Sexy Mess Rolling Out Of Bed
Description: I'm A Sexy Mess Rolling Out Of Bed by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. I'm A Sexy Mess Rolling Out Of Bed was launched in 2024.I'm A Sexy Mess Rolling Out Of Bed by The Dua Brand is an amber floral fragrance inspired by Messy Sexy Just Rolled Out Of Bed by What We Do Is Secret. This scent begins with fruity notes of bergamot and peach blossom, followed by floral notes of heliotrope and Turkish rose. The middle notes feature toffee, vanilla, and musk, leading to a base of tonka bean, cashmere wood, sandalwood, and amber.

Name: Melon Bingsu
Description: Melon Bingsu by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Melon Bingsu was launched in 2022.Dua Fragrances presents their latest creation, Melon Bingsu, an exquisite unisex fragrance that boasts a Gourmand classification. This fragrance is composed of a blend of delightful notes that include melon, shaved ice accord, vanilla ice cream, sweetened condensed milk, whipped cream, shaved almonds, and white musk. The fragrance comes in an Extrait de Parfum concentration that is packaged in a 30 mL (1 FL.OZ) bottle.Melon Bingsu is an olfactive representation of the Korean dessert that is made with shaved ice and various toppings. The fragrance opens with a bright and icy tone that is characterized by the melon and shaved ice accord notes. As it dries down, it reveals a gourmand sensation with vanilla and almond notes. Milky accents enrich the aroma for an added touch of decadence. Melon Bingsu is a perfect fragrance for summer as it is refreshing and sweet while also being suitable for wear throughout the year. This fragrance will set you apart with its unique and delightful aroma.

Name: Vanilla Baby
Accords: vanilla (100%); leather (97.3752%); aromatic (77.6875%); balsamic (71.2126%); powdery (65.8751%); warm spicy (63.6878%); fresh spicy (62.3752%); amber (56.25%); musky (54.4998%); conifer (50.9999%)
Description: Vanilla Baby by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. Vanilla Baby was launched in 2022.Vanilla Baby by The Dua Brand is a fragrance inspired by the modern masterpiece called Babycat by Yves Saint Laurent. Known for their classic and high-quality creations, Yves Saint Laurent has brought us another exceptional scent with the 2022 release of Babycat. Vanilla Baby captures the essence of this fragrance by combining exotic resins, vanilla, and spices to create a warm and congenial expression perfect for the autumn and winter seasons. The fragrance is classified as an Oriental Spicy and is available in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and captivating scent experience.The notes in Vanilla Baby include Elemi Resin, Pink Pepper, Black Pepper, Olibanum, Saffron, Bourbon Vanilla, Suede Leather, and Cedar Wood. These ingredients come together to create an aromatic blend that showcases the best expression of vanilla we have encountered in a long time. The fragrance exudes warmth and depth with the presence of spicy elements from the pink and black pepper, while the bourbon vanilla adds a sweet and creamy touch. The suede leather and cedar wood provide a dark and lasting quality to the perfume, making it an irresistible choice for those who appreciate a sophisticated and captivating fragrance.

Name: Banana Foster
Description: Banana Foster by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Banana Foster was launched in 2022.Dua Fragrances has released a new unisex scent that is sure to please those with a sweet tooth. The fragrance, named Banana Foster, is a fruity gourmand scent that captures the essence of the popular dessert. This perfume is an extrait de parfum, meaning it has a higher concentration of fragrance oils and will last longer on the skin. The bottle holds 30ml (1 fl.oz) of the scent and is perfect for those who love gourmand fragrances.Banana Foster perfume consists of notes of bananas, vanilla ice cream, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, dark rum, banana liqueur, caramel liqueur sauce, and white musk. When you first smell this perfume, you are hit with the sweet aroma of cooked bananas that have been caramelized in brown sugar. The scent is then elevated with the addition of rum that has been gently spiced. As the perfume dries down on the skin, you can detect the notes of cinnamon and banana liqueur that add to the medley of sweetness. Overall, this fragrance is perfect for those who want a sweet and intoxicating scent that is perfect for any occasion.

Name: Dirty Banana
Description: Dirty Banana by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dirty Banana was launched in 2022.Dirty Banana is an Extrait de Parfum created by Dua Fragrances, a brand that aims to provide unique and authentic scents. The fragrance is classified as fruity and is suitable for both men and women. The concentration of the perfume is high, which means that a small amount of the scent will last for a long time.Dirty Banana contains notes of banana, milk, banana flower, banana smoothie, peach, Tolu balsam, truffle, amber, and incense. The blend of these notes creates a unique and complex smell that is both sultry and addictive. The banana accord used in the fragrance is authentic and genuine, which is rare in the perfume industry. The addition of peach amplifies the fruity accord while the truffle note and incense add dirtiness to the aroma. Overall, Dirty Banana is a dark and bold fruity expression that is sure to turn heads with its complex scent.

Name: Cherry Casino
Description: Cherry Casino by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. Cherry Casino was launched in 2019.
Top Notes: ['Griotte Cherries', 'Syrup', 'Sour Cherry', 'Resins', 'Bitter Almond', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ambergris', 'Saffron', 'Cedar', 'Egyptian Jasmine', 'Musk', 'Turkish Rose', 'Peru Balsam', 'Sandalwood', 'Haitian Vetiver']

Name: Fortune
Accords: sweet (100%); vanilla (89.9999%); honey (81.4289%); tobacco (75.7146%); lavender (70.0003%); cinnamon (64.286%); warm spicy (63.1432%); aromatic (59.7144%); powdery (51.4287%); floral (50.5713%)
Description: Fortune by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. Fortune was launched in 2018.Fortune by The Dua Brand is an exquisite fragrance that embodies refinement and sophistication. Created as part of the Inspired Expressions collection, this fragrance pays homage to the ancient city of Sicily and its rich heritage. The name Fortune was chosen to represent the welcoming presence of the Mediterranean island, with its sparkling citrus notes of Sicilian Lemon and Calabrian Bergamot. As an Extrait de Parfum, this fragrance offers a long-lasting and intense concentration, ensuring that its captivating aroma lingers throughout the day. With its distinguished blend of tobacco and vanilla, Fortune makes a statement that is sure to be remembered.The fragrance of Fortune is best described as an Aromatic Spicy scent. It opens with a burst of Sicilian Lemon and Calabrian Bergamot, offering a fresh and invigorating feeling reminiscent of setting foot on the stunning Mediterranean island for the first time. Lavender adds a touch of floral elegance, while honey and cinnamon contribute a lavish sweetness that symbolizes the warmth of the land. As the composition develops, Sambac Jasmine and Cashmeran come forward, adding depth and complexity to the fragrance. Finally, the base notes of tobacco leaf, tonka bean, and vanilla provide a distinguished foundation that balances out the more volatile top notes. Overall, Fortune by The Dua Brand exudes sophistication and refinement, making it a truly captivating fragrance for both men and women.

Name: 100 Whispers
Accords: white floral (100%); woody (77.5%); powdery (69.9997%); iris (55%); vanilla (55%); tuberose (55%); earthy (55%); citrus (55%); fruity (52.5%); aromatic (50.0001%)
Description: 100 Whispers by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. 100 Whispers was launched in 2021.100 Whispers by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that embodies the essence of luxury and extravagance. Produced by Nishane, the finest perfume house in Turkey, this fragrance showcases the country's beauty in a remarkable manner. While other perfumes from Nishane, like Hacivat and Ani, have gained recognition as modern masterpieces, Hundred Silent Ways deserves more attention. This fruity floral perfume combines tuberose, peach, gardenia, iris, and jasmine to create a truly captivating scent. The sensuality of this fragrance makes it irresistible and unquestionably classy. With its shared composition of vanilla, sandalwood, and vetiver as the base notes, 100 Whispers is suitable for both men and women. The concentration of this fragrance is Extrait de Parfum, ensuring long-lasting and potent aroma.The notes that make up the enchanting scent of 100 Whispers include tuberose, jasmine, peach, orris root, sandalwood, vetiver, vanilla, mandarin orange, and gardenia. When you experience this fragrance, you will be greeted with a delightful combination of fruity and floral accords. The sweetness of peaches harmonizes with the exotic aroma of tuberose, while jasmine adds a touch of elegance. As the fragrance settles on your skin, you'll notice the warm and earthy undertones of sandalwood and vetiver blending seamlessly with the creamy richness of vanilla. Overall, 100 Whispers creates an olfactory experience that is both alluring and sophisticated.

Name: Alienated Essence
Accords: amber (100%); white floral (67.5609%); balsamic (59.3659%); woody (54.5854%); smoky (51.8536%); warm spicy (47.7562%); vanilla (47.0731%); powdery (46.3904%)
Description: Alienated Essence by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. Alienated Essence was launched in 2022.Alienated Essence by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that pays homage to the renowned designer brand, Mugler. Mugler is known for being light-years ahead of its competition, evident in their iconic fragrances such as Angel for women and A*Men. In 2012, they released a flanker of Alien called Alien Essence Absolue, which became highly sought after by fans of the line. Unfortunately, this fragrance is no longer available in stores, but The Dua Brand has recreated it with astonishing precision. Alienated Essence captures the addictive essence of the original with its mesmerizing blend of vanilla, incense, and iris. The jasmine note is equally intoxicating, while the cashmeran adds a velvety smoothness. With Alienated Essence, fans of the original can once again experience the olfactive intoxication that made Alien Essence Absolue a discontinued gem. Alienated Essence features an alluring combination of notes that create a captivating scent experience. The fragrance reveals itself through the delicate yet powerful presence of jasmine, which exudes an intoxicating floral aura. As it settles on the skin, the richness of cashmere wood emerges, bringing a warm and comforting woody facet to the composition. Orris root adds a touch of earthiness and complexity, while vanilla pod provides a creamy sweetness that intertwines with the other elements harmoniously. The base notes of white amber, myrrh, and incense add depth and sophistication to the fragrance, leaving a lingering trail that is both intriguing and addictive. With its blend of floral, woody, and amber accords, Alienated Essence can be classified as an Oriental Woody fragrance .

Name: Coconut Milk
Description: Coconut Milk by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Coconut Milk was launched in 2024.Coconut Milk from the DUA Designer Line is inspired by Lait de Coco by Le Monde Gourmand. This fragrance is designed to provide a refreshing vibe with notes of Bergamot, Vanilla Praline, and Coconut. It offers a creamy smoothness and a luxurious island-inspired richness.

Name: Dark Plum Vanille
Description: Dark Plum Vanille by The Dua Brand is a Oriental fragrance for women. Dark Plum Vanille was launched in 2023.Dark Plum Vanille by The Dua Brand is a captivating fragrance that embodies delectable charm and irresistible allure. This exquisite scent, created by Ariana Grande, seduces the senses with a symphony of desire. The juicy essence of ripe plums blends harmoniously with the sensual embrace of musk, while the delicate freesia dances frivolously on the skin. Praline whispers indulgent secrets, and orris root combines rich cacao butter with the silky sensation of a lover's caress. As vanilla lingers in the air like a sinful temptation, it leaves a trail of sweet expectation. With a concentration of Extrait de Parfum and a generous size of 34 ML (1.1 FL.OZ), Dark Plum Vanille is an alluring invitation to indulge in a world of pleasure.The fragrance of Dark Plum Vanille can be best described as an irresistible blend of enticing notes. Musk, plum, and freesia create a juicy and floral combination that captivates the senses. Praline adds a touch of indulgence, while orris root infuses the scent with a rich and velvety aroma. The presence of vanilla in the fragrance leaves a sweet and tempting trail that lingers in the air. Combined with cacao butter, it evokes intense appetites and creates a silky sensation reminiscent of a lover's caress. The overall olfactory group that best fits this description is 'Oriental Vanilla', which perfectly captures the seductive power and allure of Dark Plum Vanille.

Name: Cherry Tabacum
Description: Cherry Tabacum by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. Cherry Tabacum was launched in 2020. base notes are Cherry extract, Tobacco, Tonka Bean, Bitter Almond, Griotte Cherries, Spices, Syrup, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Dried Fruits, Woodsy Notes, Sour Cherry, Turkey Red Rose, Haitian Vetiver, Cedar, Peru Balsam, Jasmine Sambac, Tobacco Blossom and Cacao.
Base Notes: ['Cherry extract', 'Tobacco', 'Tonka Bean', 'Bitter Almond', 'Griotte Cherries', 'Spices', 'Syrup', 'Vanilla', 'Sandalwood', 'Dried Fruits', 'Woodsy Notes', 'Sour Cherry', 'Turkey Red Rose', 'Haitian Vetiver', 'Cedar', 'Peru Balsam', 'Jasmine Sambac', 'Tobacco Blossom', 'Cacao']

Name: Ajwa Dates Milk
Description: Ajwa Dates Milk by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ajwa Dates Milk was launched in 2024.Ajwa Dates Milk by Dua Fragrances is a gourmand fragrance that captures the essence of the date palm fruit. The fragrance opens with a saccharine aroma of ajwa dates, followed by a creamy milk note that adds a lactonic presence. Smooth and long-lasting vanilla pairs with the sweetness of dates for a perfect combination.

Name: Café De Dua 2.0
Description: Café De Dua 2.0 by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. Café De Dua 2.0 was launched in 2021.Dua Fragrances presents an exquisite unisex fragrance, Original: A Dua Original Blend, featuring a Wooden Plaque label. This fragrance is classified as a Gourmand with an Extrait de Parfum concentration. The brand has explored the gourmand subgenre to develop this second iteration of their bestselling fragrance, Café De Dua. The long-lasting appeal of the tonka beans, cashmeran, and coffee will give you the resolute fragrance you crave when the weather gets cold. This fragrance encompasses all of our favorite things, and we are proud to share it with you.The notes of Original: A Dua Original Blend are a perfect mix of coffee and bakery scents. The ground Colombian coffee beans tincture is enlivened by delicious notes of praline, salty caramel, chestnuts, vanilla, and a warm coffee croissant. Milky touches of steamed milk and buttercream evoke a delicious creamy adult beverage enjoyed by the fire. The scent also features nutmeg, roasted tonka beans, cashmeran, sandalwood, white musk, and toffee. This fragrance is cozy, delicious, flavorful, decadent, nostalgic and enticing! It belongs to the olfactory of Floral Fruity Gourmand.

Name: Black Widow
Description: Black Widow by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. Black Widow was launched in 2017.Black Widow by The Dua Brand is a captivating fragrance that exudes opulence and refinement. This world-class scent is classified as Oriental and is suitable for both men and women. It comes in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and intense aroma. Black Widow is a true gourmand fragrance with notes of dark rum, sugar cane, dark chocolate, coffee, caramel, almond, Javanese vetiver, heliotrope, and sandalwood. This delightful composition offers a unique olfactory experience that is unlike anything you have ever tried before.This fragrance boasts an intriguing blend of notes that creates a mouth-watering treat for the senses. The nutty quality enriched by a boozy dark rum accord adds depth and character to the composition. As the fragrance unfolds, the sweetness of sugar cane and caramel intertwine with the richness of dark chocolate, creating a delectable aroma that is impossible to resist. The subtle hints of coffee and almond add warmth and complexity to the overall scent. With its irresistible combination of gourmand elements, Black Widow is a must-have for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

Name: Belgian Choco Truffle
Description: Belgian Choco Truffle by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. The nose behind this fragrance is Mahsam Raza.Belgian Choco Truffle by Dua Fragrances is an oriental vanilla fragrance for women and men. The nose behind this fragrance is Mahsam Raza. The fragrance features milk chocolate, almond, plum, vanilla, and caramel.

Name: Zest
Accords: citrus (100%); warm spicy (74.0398%); fresh spicy (60.828%); vanilla (55.9602%); green (54.3378%); sweet (52.4836%); aromatic (50.1655%); fruity (46.9204%)
Description: Zest by The Dua Brand is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Zest was launched in 2020.

Name: Raspberry Candied Violets
Accords: violet (100%); sweet (95.1001%); fruity (86%); powdery (85.3002%); soft spicy (83.1999%); amber (72%); white floral (58%); floral (51.0002%); musky (51.0002%); rose (48.2001%)
Description: Raspberry Candied Violets by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Raspberry Candied Violets was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Raspberry and Vanilla Sugar; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Heliotrope and Almond; base notes are Violet, Amber, Black Musk and Musk.Raspberry Candied Violets is an ode to sensuality inspired by enchanting shadows.

Name: Drowning in Vanilla
Description: Drowning in Vanilla by The Dua Brand is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. Drowning in Vanilla was launched in 2020.

Name: Strawberry Milkshake
Description: Strawberry Milkshake by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Strawberry Milkshake was launched in 2022.Dua is a brand that has created an original perfume blend called 'Original.' The fragrance is a gourmand scent that is suitable for both men and women. The concentration of the perfume is an Extrait de Parfum, ensuring a long-lasting scent that will stay with the wearer throughout the day. The fragrance has been crafted to evoke childhood memories of drinking strawberry milkshakes, and it combines fresh farm strawberries with whipped cream and a strawberry milk accord.The fragrance notes of Original include Fresh Farm Strawberries, Strawberry Milk, Whipped Cream, and White Musk. When worn, the scent is youthful and playful, with a fruitiness that is delightful to the senses. The sweetness of the vanilla creates a balance between the fruity notes, making it a well-rounded fragrance. Overall, Original by Dua is a gourmand scent that will take you on a trip down memory lane.

Name: Dolce Vita
Description: Dolce Vita by The Dua Brand is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. Dolce Vita was launched in 2017.

Name: Vanilla Cake Whiskey
Description: Vanilla Cake Whiskey by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Cake Whiskey was launched in 2023.Vanilla Cake Whiskey is a gourmand fragrance by Dua Fragrances. This is an original blend that combines sweet and boozy notes to create a unique olfactory experience. The fragrance comes in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, which means that it has a high concentration of fragrance oils and lasts longer than other types of perfumes. Vanilla Cake Whiskey is a unisex scent, suitable for both men and women.The notes in Vanilla Cake Whiskey include Macallan Single Malt Whiskey, butterscotch, caramel, vanilla cake, milky tones, tonka beans, and warm amber. When you wear this fragrance, you'll notice a sweet and boozy aroma, with hints of caramel and butterscotch. The vanilla cake adds a baked goods quality to the scent, making it smell delicious and comforting. The warm amber in the base gives Vanilla Cake Whiskey a cozy feel, perfect for wearing on cold winter nights. Overall, Vanilla Cake Whiskey is a tasty fragrance that is sure to please fans of gourmand scents.

Name: Butterbeer
Description: Butterbeer by The Dua Brand is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Butterbeer was launched in 2022.Dua is a fragrance brand that offers an Original Blend called Butterbeer, which is a gourmand scent for both men and women. It comes in an Extrait de Parfum concentration and is available in a 10ml travel spray that is filled to 13ml of fragrance volume. Butterbeer is not just a perfume, but an experience, paying homage to one of the greatest novel series of our time.Butterbeer by Dua has notes of butterscotch, sugar, vanilla ice cream, cream soda, and vanilla cream. This fragrance is a fusion of gourmand ingredients that excite the senses and those around you. The butterscotch note is smooth and sweet, while the cream soda adds the perfect balance of sweetness and effervescence to expand the redolence of this dense bouquet. The vanilla ice cream and vanilla cream add creamy richness, making it bound to have you ordering second helpings. The scent is a hearty dose of butterbeer that smells incredibly delicious and appetizing .

Name: Mystical Amulet Of Blue
Description: Mystical Amulet Of Blue by The Dua Brand is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mystical Amulet Of Blue was launched in 2024.Mystical Amulet Of Blue is a fragrance inspired by Blue Talisman by Ex Nihilo. It opens with fresh and citrusy notes of pear, bergamot, and mandarin orange, followed by a spicy hint of ginger that mellows into floral notes of orange blossom. The scent is deepened with woody aromas of Georgywood and Ambrofix™, and it finishes with fresh musk amplified by Akigalawood.

Name: Creamy Coquito
Accords: coconut (100%); rum (86.0002%); warm spicy (81.3335%); cinnamon (76.6668%); fresh spicy (76.6668%); lactonic (63.8333%); tropical (51.0002%); woody (51.0002%); nutty (44.0001%)
Description: Creamy Coquito by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Creamy Coquito was launched in 2022.Dua Fragrances has released a new unisex fragrance called Creamy Coquito. This perfume is an original blend that is inspired by the Puerto Rican cocktail called coquito, which is a traditional beverage consumed during the winter holidays. The fragrance is available in Extrait de Parfum concentration and comes in a 30 ML (1 FL.OZ) bottle. Creamy Coquito is a gourmand fragrance that pays homage to Puerto Rico by infusing several varieties of coconut, cinnamon sticks, spiced dark rum, condensed milk, nutmeg, and vanilla extract into the composition. The fragrance is sure to intoxicate you with its irresistible aroma that lingers throughout the day.Creamy Coquito is a gourmand fragrance that opens up with notes of coconut and coconut cream milk before spiced dark rum takes over with its intoxicating effect. The spices gently intermingle with cinnamon, which serves to sweeten things up along with vanilla extract that indulges the base with its balmy presence. The fragrance is perfect for those who want to indulge in a delicious and authentic scent that reminds them of the winter holidays. This perfume belongs to the Floral Fruity Gourmand olfactory group as it combines fruity and floral notes with gourmand accords to create a delicious scent.

Name: Dark Angelica
Description: Dark Angelica by The Dua Brand is a Floral fragrance for women and men. Dark Angelica was launched in 2021.Dark Angelica by The Dua Brand is a fragrance inspired by the niche house Guerlain, known for creating iconic perfumes like Shalimar and Mitsouko. This oriental floral perfume showcases the note of angelica, which has a musky, sweet, and earthy aroma. Dark Angelica combines angelica with sweet vanilla and spicy caraway, resulting in a magnetic fragrance that captures the essence of Guerlain's cult following. The fragrance is presented in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and intensified scent experience. With its captivating blend of notes, Dark Angelica is a must-try for those seeking a benchmark angelica fragrance.The notes found in Dark Angelica include angelica, pear, pink pepper, caraway, jasmine, vanilla, and cedar wood. Upon application, this fragrance reveals a breathtaking and inviting jasmine note that is complemented by the bright and crisp scent of pear. The earthy and rosy aroma of pink pepper adds depth to the composition. As the fragrance develops, the sweetness of vanilla emerges, perfectly balanced by the spiciness of caraway. Finally, the woody note of cedar wood provides a warm and comforting base. Dark Angelica showcases an oriental floral olfactory group, combining floral and spicy elements to create an alluring and captivating scent experience.

Name: Dua Vaniglia
Description: Dua Vaniglia by The Dua Brand is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. Dua Vaniglia was launched in 2022.Dua Vaniglia by The Dua Brand is an exquisite fragrance inspired by the underrated Italian brand Mazzolari Vaniglia. Founded in 1888, Mazzolari Vaniglia is renowned for its decadent and saccharine warmth, mainly due to the delectable touch of vanilla in its composition. The Dua Brand aims to fulfill their mission by recreating this enchanting perfume and making it accessible to their global audience. Dua Vaniglia, with its luscious quality of vanilla, unfolds in a remarkable way, further enhanced by caramel accents and a momentary break of sweetness through orchid notes. This unisex fragrance comes in a concentration of Extrait de Parfum, ensuring a long-lasting and intense olfactory experience.The fragrance notes of Dua Vaniglia include vanilla, caramel, and orchid. Upon application, the scent envelops you with a blanket of sweetness that is utterly irresistible. The rich and creamy vanilla dominates, creating an impenetrable cloud that acts like a magnetic field, attracting everyone within your olfactive radius. The caramel accents add to the deliciousness, while the presence of orchid breaks up the sweetness momentarily, introducing a seductive floral aspect. Dua Vaniglia is the epitome of classiness and sophistication, designed for those who wish to smell their best at all times. In terms of olfactory classification, this fragrance falls under the category of Oriental Floral.

Name: Pumpkin Spice & Pecan Waffles
Description: Pumpkin Spice & Pecan Waffles by The Dua Brand is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pumpkin Spice & Pecan Waffles was launched in 2024.Pumpkin Spice & Pecan Waffles by The Dua Brand is inspired by Pumpkin Pecan Waffles by Bath & Body Works. This aromatic spicy fragrance combines the warm scent of waffles topped with sweet maple syrup, infused with spicy notes of pumpkin and crunchy walnuts, creating a delicious and cozy scent.

Name: Vanilla Boba Milk Tea
Description: Vanilla Boba Milk Tea by The Dua Brand is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Boba Milk Tea was launched in 2023.Vanilla Boba Milk Tea is a fragrance from Dua Fragrances, an original blend that takes inspiration from the popular bubble tea beverage. It is classified as a Gourmand scent that can be enjoyed by both men and women. The fragrance is an Extrait de Parfum, which means it has a high concentration of perfume oils that will last longer on the skin.The notes in Vanilla Boba Milk Tea include Black Tea Leaf, Vanilla Milk, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Vanilla Extract, Brown Sugar, and Tapioca Pearls. Upon application, the fragrance opens with a delicious blend of vanilla milk and brown sugar that creates a sweet and creamy aroma. The black tea leaf note adds a subtle hint of bitterness that balances out the sweetness. As the fragrance develops, the cinnamon and nutmeg notes become more prominent, adding a warm and spicy element to the scent. The addition of tapioca pearls gives the fragrance a unique starchy quality that works well with the gourmand notes. Overall, Vanilla Boba Milk Tea is a comforting and delicious fragrance that will satisfy any sweet tooth.

Name: Dua's Tri-Neighborhood
Description: Dua's Tri-Neighborhood by The Dua Brand is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. Dua's Tri-Neighborhood was launched in 2023.Dua's Tri-Neighborhood by The Dua Brand is a fragrance inspired by the TriBeCa neighborhood in Manhattan. Known for its industrial buildings and cobblestone roads, TriBeCa captures the classic Manhattan aesthetics. This amber vanilla perfume from 2020 combines the decadent scents of hazelnut and cacao, followed by the elegant notes of jasmine. The base notes of caramel, ambroxan, and moss add a gourmand sensation with earthiness and freshness. With its unisex appeal, Dua's Tri-Neighborhood is an Extrait de Parfum that will transport you to a classy and distinguished olfactory location, leaving a divine scent that lingers.The notes of Dua's Tri-Neighborhood include hazelnut, cacao, jasmine sambac, cedar, caramel, ambroxan, and moss. The fragrance starts with a delicious combination of hazelnut and cacao, creating an enticing aroma. As the scent develops, velvety jasmine sweeps in, adding elegance and arresting the senses. The gourmand sensation is extended by the base note of caramel, while ambroxan and moss bring an earthy and fresh touch to the fragrance. Overall, Dua's Tri-Neighborhood creates a captivating olfactory experience that exudes class and distinction.

Name: Mango Flesh
Description: Mango Flesh by The Dua Brand is a Floral fragrance for women and men. Mango Flesh was launched in 2021.Mango Flesh by The Dua Brand is a unisex fragrance that captures the succulent and multifaceted aroma of mango. This fragrance is a heavenly blend of the finest floral ingredients and hints of animalic undertones, creating a beautifully composed perfume. With its fruity and addictive smell, Mango Flesh offers the sensual aroma of clean skin combined with the sweet and delicious scent of mango. The concentration of this fragrance is Extrait de Parfum, providing a long-lasting and intense olfactory experience. Available in a 30ml (1 fl. oz) size, Mango Flesh by The Dua Brand is a must-have fragrance for those seeking the intoxicating and refreshing scent of mango. Notes: Mango, Red Wine, Orange, Violet, Frangipane, Mango Blossom, Ylang-Ylang, Black Currant, Musk, and Civet. Mango Flesh belongs to the olfactory group of 'Floral Fruity'.

Name: Midnight Rendezvous
Accords: aromatic (100%); woody (85.4716%); lavender (69.6226%); warm spicy (69.6226%); fresh spicy (59.0565%); earthy (53.7735%)
Description: Midnight Rendezvous by The Dua Brand is a Woody fragrance for men. Midnight Rendezvous was launched in 2019.Midnight Rendezvous by The Dua Brand is an Extrait de Parfum that aims to recreate the beloved projection of La Nuit De L'Homme, which had been lost in its reformulated versions. The fragrance captures the attention with its spicy cardamom notes, accompanied by the freshness of bergamot and the calming influence of lavender. The warmth of cedar adds a comforting touch, while cumin and vetiver provide a strong and alluring foundation. With a focus on sourcing the original formulation, Midnight Rendezvous endeavors to deliver a fragrance experience that meets the high standards of devoted fans. The fragrance, belonging to the Woody Spicy olfactory group, combines elements of woodiness and spiciness in an exquisite blend. As you wear Midnight Rendezvous, you will be enveloped in a captivating aura where the spiciness of cardamom intertwines with the warmth of cedar. The presence of bergamot and lavender adds a touch of freshness and tranquility to the composition. Meanwhile, cumin and vetiver contribute to the fragrance's strength and allure. Midnight Rendezvous invites you to compare it with the original La Nuit De L'Homme, as it seeks to revive the long-lasting and seductive masterpiece that captured our hearts.

Name: She Loves Red
Description: She Loves Red by The Dua Brand is a Floral fragrance for women. She Loves Red was launched in 2021.She Loves Red by The Dua Brand is a feminine fragrance that exudes a passionate love for the color red. This fragrance, classified as Oriental, is an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and intense scent experience. Inspired by Rouge Smoking by BDK Parfums, She Loves Red captivates with its ruddy hue and delightful aroma that lasts for hours. The brand has carefully crafted this fragrance, combining notes of cherry, pink pepper, bergamot, black vanilla, heliotrope, orange blossom, tonka bean, cashmere wood, white musk, labdanum, violet, and ambroxan. She Loves Red is the perfect choice for those who adore all things red and desire a scent that embodies sensuality and desire.She Loves Red belongs to the olfactory group 'Floral Fruity'. This fragrance tantalizes the senses with its combination of cherry and bergamot, creating a fruity and vibrant opening. As it develops, the alluring notes of black vanilla and heliotrope emerge, adding depth and sensuality to the composition. The fragrance is further enhanced by the subtle floral hints of orange blossom and violet. Finally, the base notes of tonka bean, labdanum, white musk, and ambroxan create a warm and inviting trail that lingers on the skin. She Loves Red is a captivating scent that beautifully captures the allure of the color red and leaves a lasting impression on anyone who wears it.

Name: Emeer
Accords: aromatic (100%); citrus (98.372%); woody (95.6856%); amber (73.2209%); fresh spicy (63.6568%); warm spicy (56.4125%); powdery (54.5814%); green (50.4301%); soft spicy (46.8894%); balsamic (46.6127%)
Description: Emeer by Lattafa Perfumes is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Emeer was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot, Clary Sage and Juniper Berries; middle notes are White Tea, Sandalwood, Cardamom and Olibanum; base notes are Ambergris, Cedarwood, Cashmeran and Patchouli.

Name: Mayar Natural Intense
Description: Mayar Natural Intense by Lattafa Perfumes is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Mayar Natural Intense was launched in 2024. Top notes are Green Tangerine, Fig, Melon and Coconut Water; middle notes are Lotus, Water Lily and Jasmine; base notes are Ambroxan, Musk, Sandalwood and Vanilla.

Name: Qaa'ed Intense
Description: Qaa'ed Intense by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Qaa'ed Intense was launched in 2024. Top notes are Tobacco, White Honey and Cinammon; middle notes are Vanilla, Cacao, Myrrh and Patchouli; base notes are Amber, French labdanum and Styrax.

Name: Ishq Al Shuyukh Silver
Accords: sweet (100%); citrus (97.9662%); fruity (95.986%); vanilla (86.728%); fresh spicy (86.728%); woody (80.841%); tropical (66.6593%); warm spicy (60.9324%); fresh (59.809%); aromatic (56.8119%)
Description: Ishq Al Shuyukh Silver by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ishq Al Shuyukh Silver was launched in 2022. Top notes are Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Pineapple and Black Pepper; base notes are Vanilla, Cedar, Amberwood and Patchouli.

Name: Fakhar Extrait
Accords: amber (100%); tuberose (83.4976%); white floral (72.7978%); citrus (64.9093%); animalic (64.2749%); musky (64.0025%); warm spicy (63.5491%); aromatic (61.917%); woody (56.5674%); soft spicy (53.983%)
Description: Fakhar Extrait by Lattafa Perfumes is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Fakhar Extrait was launched in 2023. Top notes are Grapefruit, Cardamom and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Tuberose, Solar Notes and Artemisia; base notes are Amber, Cashmeran, Leather and Labdanum.

Name: Khamrah Dukhan
Description: Khamrah Dukhan by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Khamrah Dukhan was launched in 2025. Top notes are Spices, Pimento and Mandarin; middle notes are Incense, Labdanum, Patchouli and Orange Blossom; base notes are Tobacco, Praline, Amber, Benzoin and Tonka Bean.Derived from the Arabic word "Dukhan," meaning "smoke," this fragrance embodies the ancient Middle Eastern ritual of burning perfume. Ethereal yet hypnotically captivating, Khamrah Dukhan beautifully translates the mesmerizing dance of rising smoke into an olfactory experience. Its sophisticated depth and intricate sillage offer a contemporary interpretation of timeless traditions, delivering a powerful statement of strength, elegance, and allure.The burning composition of pimento, tobacco, and amber creates a fragrance that exudes raw energy, boldness, and addictive allure. While Khamrah Dukhan remains a unisex fragrance, this edition takes on a masculine angle, embracing the strength and intensity that resonates with masculinity.A bold fusion of smoked spices, fiery pimento, and vibrant mandarin ignites the senses, drawing you into its smoldering depths. At its heart, resinous cistus and velvety orange flower mingle with mystical incense and earthy patchouli, evoking an aura of captivating intensity. Rich layers of tobacco, warm amber, luscious praline, benzoin, and creamy tonka bean deepen the intrigue, creating an undeniably powerful fragrance. Dark, enticing, and irresistibly smoky—step into the smoke.Top - Mandarin, Pimento, Smoked SpicesMiddle - Cistus, Orange Flower, Incense, PatchouliBase- Tobacco, Amber, Tonka Bean, Benzoin, Praline

Name: Brioche Vanille
Description: Brioche Vanille by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Brioche Vanille was launched in 2024. Top notes are Brioche, Bergamot and Freesia; middle notes are Balsam Fir and Heliotrope; base notes are Vanilla, Benzoin and Praline.Lattafa Pride Brioche Vanille Eau de Parfum is an exquisite blend of gourmand sweetness and floral elegance. The fragrance opens with the bright citrus of bergamot, harmonized by the soft, airy floral touch of freesia and a delectable brioche accord that evokes the comforting scent of freshly baked pastries. As it transitions, the heart notes introduce the powdery, almond-like heliotrope and the rich, resinous warmth of fir balsam, creating a cozy, yet refined feel. The base is a decadent mix of sweet vanilla, creamy praline, and the smooth, amber-like depth of benzoin, leaving a lasting, indulgent impression.Top Notes: Bergamot, Freesia, Brioche AccordMiddle Notes: Heliotrope, Fir BalsamBase Notes: Benzoin, Vanilla, Praline

Name: Amber Wood
Accords: woody (100%); warm spicy (70.8391%); amber (70.0147%); fresh spicy (54.773%); aromatic (52.9957%); patchouli (48.8913%); lavender (47.5173%); powdery (47.4398%); fruity (45.2502%)
Description: Amber Wood by Ajmal is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. Amber Wood was launched in 2014. Top notes are Cardamom, Apple, Lavender and White Pepper; middle notes are Cedar and Orris; base notes are Amber, Woody Notes and Patchouli.With a 60-year-long tradition, Ajmal presents a very special and luxurious Signature collection which includes three extraordinary fragrances based on wood: Oriental Wood, Hatkora Wood and Santal Wood. The name of the collection is W Series and it provides three niche compositions as additions to the current rich offer of the house of Ajmal, which will provide top quality raw ingredients to customers in the Middle East. Oriental, Hatkora lemon and sandalwood can be found in the ingredients of the three new perfumes and they originate from the countries best for their origin, ensuring additional value for fragrance connoisseurs."We are proudly presenting the W series to all fans of Ajmal. In accordance with time and growing needs of our customers, we initiated the Signature collection. It is a result of a blend of the best raw material used in developing new fragrances. Our Signature collection is testament of our constant research and innovations regarding ensuring the best and high quality fragrances for our clients," stated Abdulla Ajmal, CEO of Ajmal Perfumes!Fragrance Oriental Wood is a true masterpiece based on extraordinary shades of amber. It is built around juicy fruit and spices, accentuating apple, white pepper, lavender and cardamom, leading us to the warm heart composed of woody-powdery notes of orris and cedar wood. The base of the composition is formed of hot shades of amber wood and patchouli.The fragrances will be available on the market starting from June 2014, as 100 ml Eau de Parfum in black flacons with name tags in gold color.

Name: Hatkora Wood
Description: Hatkora Wood by Ajmal is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. Hatkora Wood was launched in 2014. Top notes are Hatkora lemon, Lemon and Peach; middle notes are Saffron, Ginger, Lavender and Rose; base notes are Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud), Ambergris, Amber and Musk.With a 60-year-long tradition, Ajmal presents a very special and luxurious Signature collection which includes three extraordinary fragrances based on wood: Oriental Wood, Hatkora Wood and Santal Wood. The name of the collection is W Series and it provides three niche compositions as additions to the current rich offer of the house of Ajmal, which will provide top quality raw ingredients to customers in the Middle East. Oriental, Hatkora lemon and sandalwood can be found in the ingredients of the three new perfumes and they originate from the countries best for their origin, ensuring additional value for fragrance connoisseurs."We are proudly presenting the W series to all fans of Ajmal. In accordance with time and growing needs of our customers, we initiated the Signature collection. It is a result of a blend of the best raw material used in developing new fragrances. Our Signature collection is testament of our constant research and innovations regarding ensuring the best and high quality fragrances for our clients," stated Abdulla Ajmal, CEO of Ajmal Perfumes!Perfume Hatkora Wood is a rich woody fragrance composed of semi-wild citruses (Hatkora lemon), enriched with sweet oil from lemon skins. The composition opens with citrusy notes of Hatkora wild lemon originating from Assam, Mizoram and Maupur, brought specially for creating this fragrance and combined with sweet fruity notes of peach and luminous lemon. The heart of the composition pulsates in a rhythm of spices and flowers, blending ginger, saffron, rose and lavender in a single fragrant unity. The base is hot and woody, created as a blend of woody amber, out, sandalwood, musk and ambergris.The fragrances will be available on the market starting from June 2014, as 100 ml Eau de Parfum in black flacons with name tags in gold color.

Description: Amir One by Ajmal is a fragrance for women and men. Amir One was launched in 2021. Top notes are Bergamot, Lemon, Lavender and Clary Sage; middle notes are Sandalwood, Rose, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley and Patchouli; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Amber and Musk.

Name: Violet Musc
Description: Violet Musc by Ajmal is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Violet Musc was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Abdulla Ajmal.The latest collection AJMAL M SERIES is inspired by shades of musk intertwines in three new compositions, Oriental Musc, Violet Musc and Cuir Musc. Focus of the new composition lies on musk interpreted in oriental spirit, created of top quality raw materials.Violet Musc sounds the most attractive since it provides a sensual blend of musk and velvety violet. Its composition opens with floral scents of lily of the valley, ylang-ylang and rose enveloped in musk. The heart blooms with intense violet resting on warm aromas of amber and musk.Fragrances by Ajmal M Series are available in white flacons, as 100ml starting from spring 2015.

Name: Amir Two
Description: Amir Two by Ajmal is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amir Two was launched in 2022. Top notes are Nutmeg, Rose, Geranium, Pepper and Ginger; middle notes are Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Cashmere Wood, Amber and Patchouli; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Gurjan balsam, Musk and Incense.Presenting the regal new 'Amir Two' – the next essence in the Amir Series from Ajmal Perfumes. Each drop of its sublime essence is a signature in Oriental perfume artistry. The fragrance's top notes open on luxurious Floral, Spicy hues of Rose, Geranium, Nutmeg, Ginger, and Pepper. The perfume's heart resonates with masterfully crafted Orientaly, Woody tones of Oriental, Cypriol, Patchouli, and Cashmere Wood. And its base is the classic Ajmal Perfumes Oriental one with Balsamic, Musky, and Oudhy nuances of Gurjun Balsam, Incense, Musk and Oudh.

Name: Amber Oud Aqua Dubai
Description: Amber Oud Aqua Dubai by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Aqua Dubai was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot, Green Notes and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Amber, Melon, Black Currant and Pineapple; base notes are Musk, Petitgrain, Galbanum and Vanilla.Dive into the refreshing temptation of the Arabian Sea with Haramain Amber Oud Aqua Dubai—a fragrance that captures the essence of Dubai's coastal charm. At the forefront, bergamot, green notes, and mandarin orange dance like sunlight on the water, evoking the crispness of a sea breeze. As you journey deeper, middle notes of melon, pineapple, amber, and black currant emerge, painting a picture of tropical indulgence against a backdrop of azure waters. These scents intertwine seamlessly, creating a symphony of sweetness and sophistication that lingers on the skin like a gentle caress.The base notes of musk, vanilla, galbanum, and petitgrain anchor the fragrance, adding a touch of depth and complexity reminiscent of the coastal landscape. With Haramain Amber Oud Aqua Dubai, every spritz is an invitation to immerse yourself in the vibrant energy and timeless elegance of Dubai's aquatic allure.

Name: Amber Oud Dubai Night
Description: Amber Oud Dubai Night by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Dubai Night was launched in 2024. Top notes are Saffron, Bergamot and elemi; middle notes are Agarwood, Bulgarian Rose and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber, White Musk and Oakmoss.As the sun dips below the horizon, Dubai transforms into a playground of enchantment and allure, and Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night becomes the scent of the city's nocturnal adventures. Picture yourself stepping into the booming energy of the night, where each scent note is a chapter in a captivating tale. At the outset, bergamot, saffron, and elemi cast a spell of anticipation, their citrusy and spicy fragrances hinting at the adventures to come. As the evening deepens, agarwood, Bulgarian rose, and lily of the valley emerge, evoking the romance and mystery of the Dubai night.Finally, the base notes of white musk, tonka bean, amber, and oakmoss linger like whispers in the desert breeze, leaving an indelible mark on the senses. With Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night as your companion, every moment becomes an unforgettable journey through the enchanting streets of Dubai under the starlit sky.

Name: Royal Musk
Description: Royal Musk by Al Haramain Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. Royal Musk was launched in 2021. Top notes are Ylang-Ylang, Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Orris, Lily-of-the-Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Musk and Beeswax.The best adjective to describe our Royal Musk is “Sensational”. The Royal Musk is an intriguing scent with the boldness of citrusy notes like bergamot and pepper. A little Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, and Lily of the Valley have brought some excitement to the fragrance. No matter what you will definitely get noticed for your vibrancy while wearing the royal musk. The vividness of floral sweetness is well balanced with Beeswax to enhance your personality.Top note: Bergamot, Pepper, & Ylang-YlangMiddle note : Jasmin, Lily of the Valley, Oris RootsBase note: Musk, Beeswax

Description: 50 Years Platinum Oud by Al Haramain Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. 50 Years Platinum Oud was launched in 2021. Top notes are Black Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Dry Wood, Cedar and Vetiver; base notes are Amber, Musk and Tonka Bean.After 5 decades of excellence, we have mastered the art and craft of perfume making, and continue our tradition of adding class to perfection. Platinum Oud is just one of those gems from the house of Al Haramain, a scent that tells the story of prestige, exclusivity, power, and influence – the very qualities that resonate with the aspirations of the bold and confident. Name: Urbanist Femme
Description: Urbanist Femme by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Top notes are Pineapple, Apple, Lemon and Orange; middle notes are Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Amber."Vivaciously Aggressive!Urbanist Femme… it’s romantic, comforting and classy all at once; not to forget an under-current of passionate energy. The spirit of this very modernistic fragrance is reminiscent of the perfect date at a fancy restaurant, before of course the inhibitions ooze out and take you from playing the eye batting cutie to being vivaciously aggressive. The kind of scent that keeps up with your mood, personality & style, Urbanist Femme is a fragrance that you wear…and expectedly it wears you back. A fragrant unison!" -  a note from the brand.

Name: Narjis
Description: Narjis by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Floral fragrance for women. Narjis was launched in 2021. Top notes are Hawthorn and Cassis; middle notes are Violet, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Musk and Vanilla.It’s royal, it’s floral, it’s the personification of all the endearing qualities to desire in a fragrance that you can proudly make your crowning glory, in return for making you stand out from among the rest. With a unique harmony of fresh and sweet floral notes, and a base of vanilla and musk, add a majestic touch to your graceful presence.Top note: Hawthorne, Cassie BlossomsMiddle note: Rose, Jasmine, VioletBase note: Vanilla, Musk

Name: Haramain Oud Cambodi Intense
Description: Haramain Oud Cambodi Intense by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. Top notes are Castoreum and Agarwood (Oud); middle note is Cashmere Wood; base notes are Animal notes, Musk and Sandalwood."At last, a fragrance for the heroic, the ones who can walk with charm, grace and poise in the densest of woods. Haramain Oud Cambodi Intense is a magnificent blend of the finest, rarest and exotic woody and animalic elements into a fragrance that immerses you into a rich, pleasant, relaxing and uplifting woody experience. Relish the deliciously prolific perfume and unearth the hidden treasures of nature waiting to be discovered." -  a note from the brand.

Description: Musk Al Haramain by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. Musk Al Haramain was launched in 2021. Top note is Fruity Notes; middle notes are Rose, Violet and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Musk, Cedar, Vanilla and Amber."To have a perfume oil awake your inner passions and appeal to unknown desires is what Musk Al Haramain does to you. Each drop of this exquisite blend of elegance will make you pause and contemplate. What draws you to this fragrance is how such a beautifully blended oil would initiate such emotions within you. most importantly, how is it possible that from such a beautifully designed bottle, you can have a further appreciation for the better things in life."Top note: FruityMiddle note: Rose, Lily of the Valley, VioletBase note: Musk, Cedarwood, Vanilla, Oriental
